entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error message for non-collection typed `params` is unclear #75623
  • Assert in OperationExtensions.GetValueUsageInfo for not matching IListPatternOperation #75622
  • An `unmanaged` constraint check causes a stack overflow in an error scenario #75620
    17.13

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35423.134 #75614

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue in PatternMatcher code where it was using a caseInsensitive index #75621
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix ref analysis of self-assignment #75618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75617
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Allow the client to update the server logging level dynamically #75615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce lock usage during EditDistance.GetEditDistance and BKTree.Find #75610
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use distinct EventSource names for compiler and workspace layer events #75613
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Ensure we only capture the BuildNumber when setting OriginalBuildNumber. #75616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix spelling of an error message #75601
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • When replacing CodeStyle analyzers do not provide Features analyzers fallback options #75534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable flakey test TestHandleExceptionFromGetCompletionChange #75612
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Ensure that `GetSymbolInfo` returns only constructor symbols for object creation expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Propagate spread suppression #75596
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
